name: Tetris The Absolute The Grand Master 2
summary: Tetris The Absolute The Grand Master 2 (commonly referred to as "T.A.") is the second arcade game in Arika's TGM series. Among other things, TGM2 introduced the less-intimidating Normal Mode to attract more casual gamers, as well as an all-new grading system in Master Mode, the continuation of TGM's original gameplay which extends the classic TGM gameplay with larger speed increases, more requirements to achieve the M or GM grades. Shortly after TGM2 was released, Arika offered a free upgrade to a PLUS version, which added TGM+ Mode and T.A. Death Mode.
